item.title: You Won't Believe What BLACKPINK Looked Like in Their 'How You Like That' Music Video!
item.description: Introduction Blackpink is a South Korean girl group that has been making waves in the music industry since their debut in 2016. In this blog post, we’ll take a look at BLACKPINK’s transformation in the “How You Like That” music video, and why it’s been so popular.

item.title: You Won't Believe What Happens When Blackpink and BTS Collide on 'How You Like That'!
item.description: Introduction In June 2020, the K-pop world was rocked by the unexpected collaboration of two of its biggest stars, Blackpink and BTS. item.title: You Won't Believe What Blackpink's Lisa Did Next in 'How You Like That'!
